short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you compare prices and find the best deals on Amazon and Flipkart while shopping online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing ShopAssist, your ultimate shopping companion! This extension helps you make informed purchasing decisions by providing you with a detailed comparison of products from multiple online retailers such as Amazon and Flipkart. With ShopAssist, you can easily access the best deals, prices and reviews of products while you shop online. Simply navigate to a product page or search page on either Amazon or Flipkart and click on the ShopAssist icon in your browser. This extension will then provide you with a comparison of the product, making your shopping experience easier, faster and more convenient. Say goodbye to endless browsing and hello to smart shopping with ShopAssist!
